00030         void SetPushed(bool n_pushed, int iButton);
00031         void Clear() {button.clear();};
00032         void SetVisible(bool n_visible, int iButton) {button[iButton].SetVisible(n_visible);};
00033         unsigned int GetNButton() {return button.size();};
00034         bool GetIsNewUnpushed(int iButton) {return button[iButton].GetNewUnpushed();};
00035         bool GetIsNewPushed(int iButton) {return button[iButton].GetNewPushed();};
00036         bool GetIsPushedAndUnpush(int iButton) {return button[iButton].GetIsPushedAndUnpush();};
00037         C_Button * GetButton(int iButton) {return &button[iButton];};
